headline: Braised Collard Greens
name: Braised Collard Greens
description: These braised collard greens are simmered in stock with ham hocks, salt pork, bay leaves, red pepper flakes, and sugar until tender and delicious.
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds collard greens - rinsed, stemmed and thinly sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Pour chicken stock into a large pot. Add ham hocks, salt pork, onion, bay leaves, sugar, and red pepper flakes. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to simmer, and cook for 30 minutes.
Stir collard greens into the pot and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to simmer and cook until greens are tender, about 30 minutes. Season with red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper.
